line.words: Les Cheveux Verts et le Garçon Invisible

subtitle.line: Det grønne hår og den usynlige dreng
The Green Hair and The Invisible Boy
The Green Hair and The Invisible Boy

line.words: §Salut! Je m’appelle Yohan. Je suis triste. Je suis triste parce que je suis invisible. Il y a une photo de moi sur cette page. Mais tu ne peux pas me voir.§

subtitle.line: Hej!Jeg hedder Johan. Jeg er ked af det. Jeg er ked af det, fordi jeg er usynlig. Der er et billede af mig på den side. Men du kan ikke se mig.
§Hello! My name’s Johann. I’m sad. I’m sad because I am invisible. There is a photo of me on that page. But you can’t see me.§
§Hello! My name’s Johann. I’m sad. I’m sad because I am invisible. There is a photo of me on that page. But you can’t see me.§

line.words: §Je veux que tout le monde puisse me voir. Est-ce que tout le monde peut te voir? Ça doit être génial.§

subtitle.line: Jeg vil gerne have, at alle kan se mig. Kan alle se dig? Det må være dejligt.
§I want everybody to be able to see me. Can everyone see you? It must be great.§
§I want everybody to be able to see me. Can everyone see you? It must be great.§

line.words: §Je veux que tout le monde voie mon pied quand je joue au foot… ma tête quand je parle… ma jambe quand je marche et mes épaules quand je les hausse. Mais ils ne peuvent pas.§

subtitle.line: Jeg vil gerne have, at alle kan se min fod, når jeg spiller fodbold...min hånd, når jeg skriver...mit hoved, når jeg snakker...mit ben, når jeg går og mine skuldre, når jeg trækker på dem. Men det kan de ikke.
§I want everybody to see my foot when I play football… my head when I talk… my leg when I walk and my shoulders when I shrug. But they can’t.§
§I want everybody to see my foot when I play football… my head when I talk… my leg when I walk and my shoulders when I shrug. But they can’t.§

line.words: §Pourquoi tu ne pars pas en quête de visibilité, Yohan?§, demande la maman de Yohan. §Qu’est-ce que c’est une quête ?§ §C’est quand tu pars en voyage pour trouver quelque chose§, dit la maman de Yohan. §Oui, je vais faire ça!§

subtitle.line: “Hvorfor tager du ikke på rejse efter synlighed, Johan?, siger Johans mor.”“Hvad for en rejse?”“En rejse, hvor du leder efter noget”, siger Johans mor.“Det vil jeg gøre”
§Why don’t you go on a quest for visibility, Johann?§ says Johann’s mum. §What is a quest?§ §It’s when you go on a journey to look for something,§ says Johann’s mum. §Yes! I will.§
§Why don’t you go on a quest for visibility, Johann?§ says Johann’s mum. §What is a quest?§ §It’s when you go on a journey to look for something,§ says Johann’s mum. §Yes! I will.§

line.words: §Je vais commencer ma quête à l’école.§ Sur le chemin de l’école, Yohan chante une chanson. §Rouge et jaune et rose et vert, violet et orange et bleu, je peux voir un arc-en-ciel, mais moi, je ne me vois pas.§

subtitle.line: §I’ll start my quest at school.§ On the way to school, Johann sings a song. §Red and yellow and pink and green, purple and orange and blue, I can see a rainbow, but I can’t see me.§
§I’ll start my quest at school.§ On the way to school, Johann sings a song. §Red and yellow and pink and green, purple and orange and blue, I can see a rainbow, but I can’t see me.§

line.words: Il aime chanter quand il marche. Ça l’aide à se sentir plus visible et moins triste.

subtitle.line: Han kan godt lide at synge, mens han går. Det får ham til at føle sig mere synlig og mindre ked af det.
He likes to sing as he walks. It helps to make him feel more visible and less sad.
He likes to sing as he walks. It helps to make him feel more visible and less sad.

line.words: Yohan rencontre ses camarades à l’école. Il décide qu’avant de partir sur sa quête, il va découvrir à quoi les gens ressemblent.

subtitle.line: Johan møder sine klassekammerater på skolen. Han beslutter sig for, inden han rejser, at han vil finde ud af, hvor forskellige folk ser ud.
Johann meets his classmates at school. He decides that before he goes on his quest, he will find out about the different ways people look.
Johann meets his classmates at school. He decides that before he goes on his quest, he will find out about the different ways people look.

line.words: §Salut Jennifer. A quoi ressembles-tu?§ §Salut Yohan. J’ai les yeux marron et les cheveux bruns.§

subtitle.line: “Hej Jennifer. Hvordan ser du ud?”“Hej Johan. Jeg har brune øjne og brunt hår”.
§Hi Jennifer. What do you look like?§ §Hi Johann. I have brown eyes and brown hair.§
§Hi Jennifer. What do you look like?§ §Hi Johann. I have brown eyes and brown hair.§

line.words: §Salut Marvel. A quoi ressembles-tu?§ §Salut Yohan. J’ai les yeux verts et les cheveux noirs.§

subtitle.line: “Hej Marvel. Hvordan ser du ud?”“Hej Johan. Jeg har grønne øjne og sort hår”.
§Hi Marvel. What do you look like?§ §Hi Johann. I have green eyes and black hair.§
§Hi Marvel. What do you look like?§ §Hi Johann. I have green eyes and black hair.§

line.words: §Salut Tom. A quoi ressembles-tu?§ “Salut Yohan. J’ai les yeux bleus et les cheveux roux.”

subtitle.line: “Hej Tom. Hvordan ser du ud?”“Hej Johan. Jeg har blå øjne og rødt hår”.
§Hi Tom. What do you look like?§ §Hi Johann. I have blue eyes and ginger hair.§
§Hi Tom. What do you look like?§ §Hi Johann. I have blue eyes and ginger hair.§

line.words: Finalement, il demande à Mo. §Salut Mo. A quoi ressembles-tu?§ §Salut Yohan. J’ai les yeux marron et les cheveux blonds.§ §Mes amis ont tous l’air différent,§ pense Yohan. “Je veux avoir l’air différent aussi.”

subtitle.line: Til sidst spørger han Mo. “Hej Mo. Hvordan ser du ud?”“Hej Johan. Jeg har brune øjne og lyst hår”.“Mine venner ser forskellige ud”, tænker Johan. “Jeg vil også se anderledes ud”.
Finally, he asks Mo. §Hi Mo. What do you look like?§ §Hi Johann. I have brown eyes and blond hair.§ §My friends all look different,§ thinks Johann. §I want to look different too.§
Finally, he asks Mo. §Hi Mo. What do you look like?§ §Hi Johann. I have brown eyes and blond hair.§ §My friends all look different,§ thinks Johann. §I want to look different too.§

line.words: §Où devrais-je commencer ma quête?§ demande Yohan à son professeur.

subtitle.line: “Hvor skal jeg starte min rejse?”, spørger Johan sin lærer.
§Where shall I start my quest?§ Johann asks his teacher.
§Where shall I start my quest?§ Johann asks his teacher.

line.words: §Va trouver la vieille bête des montagnes,§ répond son professeur. §La vieille bête sait beaucoup de choses parce qu’elle est très vieille.§

subtitle.line: “Du skal finde det ældgamle uhyre i bjergene”, siger hans lærer. “Det ældgamle uhyre ved så meget, fordi han er så gammel”.
§Go and find the ancient beast of the mountains,§ his teacher says. §The ancient beast knows a lot because it is so old.§
§Go and find the ancient beast of the mountains,§ his teacher says. §The ancient beast knows a lot because it is so old.§

line.words: Et c’est comme ça que Yohan commence sa quête. Il marche et il marche beaucoup, en direction des montagnes.

subtitle.line: Så begynder Johan sin rejse. Han går og han går hen imod bjergene.
And so Johann begins his quest. He walks and he walks, towards the mountains.
And so Johann begins his quest. He walks and he walks, towards the mountains.

line.words: Pendant qu’il marche, il chante sa chanson. §Rouge et jaune et rose et vert, violet et orange et bleu, je peux voir un arc-en-ciel, mais moi, je ne me vois pas. Pas encore!§

subtitle.line: Mens han går, synger han sin sang.“Rød og gul og rosa og grøn, lilla og orange og blå. Jeg kan se en regnbue, men jeg kan ikke se mig selv. Endnu.”
As he walks he sings his song. §Red and yellow and pink and green, purple and orange and blue, I can see a rainbow, but I can’t see me. Yet.§
As he walks he sings his song. §Red and yellow and pink and green, purple and orange and blue, I can see a rainbow, but I can’t see me. Yet.§

line.words: Sur le chemin des montagnes, Yohan arrive près d’une rivière. Dans la rivière, il voit un grand poisson bleu. Le grand poisson bleu saute hors de l’eau et parle à Yohan!

subtitle.line: På vej til bjergene kommer Johan til en flod. I floden kan han se en stor blå fisk. Den store blå fisk hopper op af vandet og taler til Johan!
On the way to the mountains, Johann comes to a river. In the river he sees a big blue fish. The big blue fish jumps out of the water and speaks to Johann!
On the way to the mountains, Johann comes to a river. In the river he sees a big blue fish. The big blue fish jumps out of the water and speaks to Johann!

line.words: §Si tu veux que la vieille bête des montagnes t’aide, tu dois lui apporter un cadeau,§ dit le poisson avant de disparaitre.

subtitle.line: “Hvis du vil have, at det ældgamle uhyre i bjergene skal hjælpe dig, skal du tage en gave med til ham”, siger fisken og forsvinder.
§If you want the ancient beast of the mountains to help you, you must take a present to it,§ says the fish, and disappears.
§If you want the ancient beast of the mountains to help you, you must take a present to it,§ says the fish, and disappears.

line.words: §Qu’est-ce que je peux donner à la vieille bête des montagnes?§ réfléchit Yohan. Il s’assied et mange une amande. Puis, un oiseau orange apparait et chante pour lui. §Offre-lui quelques unes de tes amandes.§

subtitle.line: “Hvad kan jeg give det ældgamle uhyre i bjergene?”, tænker Johan. Han sætter sig ned og spiser en mandel. Så kommer der en orange fugl og synger for ham: “Giv ham nogle af dine mandler”.
§What can I give the ancient beast of the mountains?§ thinks Johann. He sits down and eats an almond. Then an orange bird appears and sings to him. §Offer it some of your almonds.§
§What can I give the ancient beast of the mountains?§ thinks Johann. He sits down and eats an almond. Then an orange bird appears and sings to him. §Offer it some of your almonds.§

line.words: Yohan regarde ses amandes. §C’est une idée géniale! Merci l’oiseau!§ Yohan continue son voyage dans les montagnes.

subtitle.line: Johan kigger på sine mandler. “God idé. Tak fugl!” Johan fortsætter rejsen til bjergene.
Johann looks at his almonds. §A great idea! Thank you bird!§ Johann continues his journey into the mountains.
Johann looks at his almonds. §A great idea! Thank you bird!§ Johann continues his journey into the mountains.

line.words: Yohan marche pendant sept heures dans les montagnes et jusqu’au sommet où habite la vieille bête des montagnes.

subtitle.line: Johan går i syv timer, ind i bjergene og til toppen, hvor det ældgamle uhyre i bjergene bor.
Johann walks for seven hours, into the mountains and to the peaks where the ancient beast of the mountains lives.
Johann walks for seven hours, into the mountains and to the peaks where the ancient beast of the mountains lives.

line.words: Il voit la vieille bête des montagnes! Elle a une queue verte…

subtitle.line: Han ser det ældgamle uhyre i bjergene!Han har en grøn hale...
He sees the ancient beast of the mountains! It has a green tail…
He sees the ancient beast of the mountains! It has a green tail…

line.words: Elle a des dents menaçantes…

subtitle.line: Han har grumme tænder…
It has ferocious teeth…
It has ferocious teeth…

line.words: Elle a des cornes orange et jaunes…

subtitle.line: Han har orange og gule horn...
It has orange and yellow horns…
It has orange and yellow horns…

line.words: Elle a des griffes terribles…

subtitle.line: Han har frygtelige kløer…
It has terrible claws…
It has terrible claws…

line.words: Elle a des longs cheveux bruns qui recouvrent son visage!

subtitle.line: Og han har langt brunt hår, der dækker hans ansigt!
And it has long brown hair that covers its face!
And it has long brown hair that covers its face!

line.words: §Salut!§ dit Yohan. §J’ai des amandes pour toi.§ Il offre les amandes à la vieille bête des montagnes. §Je veux être visible. Peux-tu m’aider ?§

subtitle.line: “Hej”, siger Johan. “Jeg har nogle mandler til dig”. Han giver mandlerne til det ældgamle uhyre i bjergene. “Jeg vil gerne være synlig. Kan du hjælpe mig?”
§Hello!§ says Johann. §I have some almonds for you.§ He offers the almonds to the ancient beast of the mountains. §I want to be visible. Can you help me?§
§Hello!§ says Johann. §I have some almonds for you.§ He offers the almonds to the ancient beast of the mountains. §I want to be visible. Can you help me?§

line.words: §Je déteste les amandes!§ rugit la vieille bête. §Mais c’est l’intention qui compte! Je peux t’aider. Tu veux être visible? Je vais te donner la visibilité. Personne ne pourra te rater!§

subtitle.line: “Jeg hader mandler!”, brøler det ældgamle uhyre. ”Men det er tanken, der tæller. Jeg kan hjælpe dig. Du vil gerne være synlig? Jeg vil give dig synlighed. Ingen vil kunne overse dig!”
§I hate almonds!§ roars the ancient beast. §But it is the thought that counts! I can help you. You want to be visible? I will give you visibility. No-one will be able to miss you!§
§I hate almonds!§ roars the ancient beast. §But it is the thought that counts! I can help you. You want to be visible? I will give you visibility. No-one will be able to miss you!§

line.words: §Rentre à la maison. Quand tu y arriveras, regarde dans le miroir.§

subtitle.line: Tag hjem. Når du kommer hjem, skal du se dig I spejlet.
§Go home. When you get there, look in the mirror.§
§Go home. When you get there, look in the mirror.§

line.words: Yohan quitte la vieille bête des montagnes. §Merci!§ dit-il.

subtitle.line: Johan forlader det ældgamle uhyre i bjergene. “Tak”, siger han
Johann leaves the ancient beast of the mountains. §Thank you!§ he says.
Johann leaves the ancient beast of the mountains. §Thank you!§ he says.

line.words: Il redescend les montagnes.

subtitle.line: Han går ned ad bjerget.
He walks back down the mountains.
He walks back down the mountains.

line.words: Il passe près de la rivière. §Merci!§ dit-il à l’oiseau orange. §Merci!§ dit-il au grand poisson bleu.

subtitle.line: Han går forbi floden. ”Tak”, siger han til den orange fugl. ”Tak”, siger han til den store blå fisk.
He walks past the river. §Thank you!§ he says to the orange bird. §Thank you!§ he says to the big blue fish.
He walks past the river. §Thank you!§ he says to the orange bird. §Thank you!§ he says to the big blue fish.

line.words: Finalement, il arrive à la maison. Il va vers le miroir. Il regarde dans le miroir.

subtitle.line: Endelig er han hjemme. Han går hen til spejlet. Han ser ind i spejlet.
Finally, he arrives home. He goes to the mirror. He looks in the mirror.
Finally, he arrives home. He goes to the mirror. He looks in the mirror.

line.words: §J’ai les cheveux verts! Et j’ai des cornes! Et je porte des lunettes!” Voilà à quoi il ressemblait.

subtitle.line: “Jeg har grønt hår! Og jeg har horn! Og jeg har briller!” Og det havde han.
§I have green hair! And I have horns! And I have glasses!§ And so he did
§I have green hair! And I have horns! And I have glasses!§ And so he did.
Slut.
The end.
The end.
